body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean County } Sct..

I Douglas Little Presiding Judge of McLean County Do certify that Newman M. Peay ^Personally^ appeared before me and took the following oath- I Newman M. Peay do solemnly swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States and the constitution of Kentucky and will discharge all and singular the duties and services appertaining ^to the office of^ Captain in the Volunteer Militia agreeably to the law and general regulations and will obey such orders and institutions as I shall from time to time receive from the proper officers.
Which is hereby certified to general head Quarters
Given under my hand at Calhoon Ky this 23rd Day of November 1861.

Douglas Little
P. J. McLean County
